entry.title: Lost Stars 吉他谱
entry.content:

Take my | |Em|Famj7| |hand let’s see where we wake up to|morrow. Best laid | |Em|Famj7| |plans sometimes it’s just a one night|stand. I’d be | |Em|Famj7| |damned Cupid’s demanding back his |arrow. So let’s get| |G|G7| | drunk on |our tears and| |Famj7|C| |God, tell us the |reason youth is wasted on the| |Famj7|C| |young?
